name: AI use permitted
description: Defines if the processor is allowed to use the controller's data for AI purposes, e.g., for training, inference, or other purposes.

name: Confidentiality obligation
description: Requires the processor to ensure that any personnel authorized to process personal data are bound by confidentiality obligations.

name: Subprocessor notification obligation
description: Evaluate if the provider must notify the controller of any new subprocessors it engages to process personal data.
outputFormat: Consent required | Notice required | None | Other

name: Data residency requirements
description: Geographic restrictions on where personal data can be processed or stored.

name: Data Subject Rights (DSR) Assistance
description: Processor's obligation to assist the controller in responding to requests from data subjects exercising their rights.

name: Security incident notification
description: Processor's obligation to notify the controller upon becoming aware of a personal data breach or security incident.

name: Incident cooperation
description: Requires the processor to reasonably cooperate with the controller in the investigation, mitigation, and remediation of any security incident.

name: Audit rights
description: Controller's right to audit the processor's compliance with the DPA.

name: Data protection impact assessment assistance
description: Processor's obligation to provide reasonable assistance to the controller with conducting Data Protection Impact Assessments.

name: Data deletion
description: Procedures for returning or deleting personal data at the end of the service agreement.

name: Specific law compliance
description: Clauses addressing compliance with other emerging US state privacy laws, such as CCPA

name: GDPR compliance
description: Explicit clauses addressing compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

name: Limitation of liability
description: Clauses addressing liability and/or indemnification specifically related to data protection breaches or failures under the DPA.
outputFormat: X times annual fees | Capped at X | None
